Package org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.data

Interface AsyncDataProvider.Loader<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - data provider model type
    Enclosing class:
    AsyncDataProvider<T>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface AsyncDataProvider.Loader<T>
    Callback interface for asynchronous loading of data for a AsyncDataProvider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Stream<? extends T> load​(long id)
      Perform a load operation.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        Stream<? extends T> load​(long id)
                  throws InterruptedException
        Perform a load operation.

        This method runs in a background thread; in particular, no VaadinSession will be locked.

        This method should be prepared to handle an interrupt if/when AsyncDataProvider.cancel() is invoked; in that case this method may throw InterruptedException.

        This method returns a Stream but the Stream is not actually read in the background thread; that operation occurs later, with the VaadinSesion locked, and possibly in a different thread. In cases where this matters (e.g., the data is gathered in a per-thread transactions), this method may need to proactively pull the data into memory ahead of time.

        This method may cancel itself by throwing InterruptedException unprompted; a AsyncDataProvider.LoadListener.CANCELED event will be reported.

        If this method returns null, the load fails with an IllegalArgumentException and AsyncDataProvider.LoadListener.FAILED is reported.

        Parameters:
        id - unique ID for this load attempt
        Returns:
        stream of data items
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted
        RuntimeException - if an error occurs during loading
